text: Thomas Jacob Black (born August 28, 1969) is an American actor, comedian and musician. He is an important member of the Frat Pack, a name used by members of the media for a group of comedians active in today's Hollywood movies. Black is also in order for some of Hollywood's largest movies and smallest indie films. He and Kyle Gass make up the comedy-rock duo Tenacious D. Black starred in the movie Tenacious D in The Pick of Destiny, which is based on a true story. He also starred in the 2008 movie Tropic Thunder. ==Early and personal life== Black was born on August 28, 1969, in Santa Monica, California to Thomas Black and Judith Cohen. His father is of English, French, German, Irish, Scottish, and Welsh descent. His mother is Jewish and of Russian descent. Since March 14, 2006, he is married to Tanya Haden. They have two sons. ==Filmography== Year Title Role Notes 1992 Bob Roberts Roger Davis 1993 Airborne Augie Demolition Man Wasteland Scrap 1994 The NeverEnding Story III: Escape from Fantasia Slip 1995 Bye Bye Love DJ at party Waterworld Pilot Dead Man Walking Craig Poncelet 1996 Bio-Dome Himself with his band Tenacious D The Cable Guy Rick Legatos The Fan Broadcast technician Mars Attacks!
